name: Midnight Club Los Angeles Complete Edition
name_original: Midnight Club Los Angeles Complete Edition
description:
Race the hottest, fully customizable real world cars and superbikes day to night across stunning real-world L.A. Midnight Club Los Angeles Complete Edition adds the iconic South Central area plus new vehicles, parts, music and races including delivery missions and red-light races.

• LOS ANGELES PLUS – Complete Edition offers Midnight Club Los Angeles plus all South Central Downloadable Content which expands the original map by 1/3rd, adding off-road areas, stunt jumps and more.

• HUNDREDS OF WAYS TO RACE – Midnight Club Los Angeles and the South Central Map Expansion blend seamlessly for a total of over 300 races.

• NEW LICENSED, FULLY CUSTOMIZABLE VEHICLES – 60+ race-ready vehicles including classic Lowriders, Police Cruisers and the Range Rover SUV.

• STAR-STUDDED SOUNDTRACK – Eagles of Death Metal, MGMT, Young Jeezy feat. Kanye West and more.
